sections.heading: assessments; interest; limit.No special assessment levied for the purpose aforesaid shall draw interest at a rate exceeding nine percent per annum from the date of delinquency until paid

sections.text:
31-518.Delinquent assessments; interest; limit.

No special assessment levied for the purpose aforesaid shall draw interest at a rate exceeding nine percent per annum from the date of delinquency until paid.

SourceLaws 1927, c. 144, § 2, p. 392;C.S.1929, § 31-612;Laws 1933, c. 136, § 26, p. 539;C.S.Supp.,1941, § 31-612;R.S.1943, § 31-518.
